BannerPigeon adds a carrier pigeon mail system to Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord. Send letters to any lord, your caravan leaders, or even port cities to recall your fleet! Perfect for diplomacy, recruitment, and managing your clan efficiently.
New in v1.5.0: • Searchable Lord List: Contact ANY lord in the world via a searchable lineup! • Fleet Recall: Send a letter to a port city to summon your fleet. • Consolidated UI: Simplified and cleaner menu options.
Features: • Contact any lord remotely via carrier pigeon (Searchable!) • Contact your own caravan leaders remotely • Fleet Recall system for port cities • Realistic Travel Time: Optional distance-based delays (pigeons fly across the map!) • Conversation Queue: Never miss a response - letters queue up if you are busy • Settlement Support: Contact lords whether they are in a party or resting in a town • Prisoner Checks: Smart validation prevents wasting pigeons on imprisoned lords • Economy System: Gold cost is paid to the local settlement owner (if applicable) • Full MCM (Mod Configuration Menu) integration for easy customization • Save game compatible - uses proper save system serialization
MCM Settings: • Pigeon Cost: Adjust gold required per message • Response Time: Choose between fixed days or realistic distance-based travel • Pigeon Speed: Fine-tune how fast pigeons fly when using realistic travel time • Location Toggles: Enable/disable in towns or castles • Notification Options: Control response arrival alerts
Perfect for players who want to streamline diplomacy, avoid endless map travel, and focus on strategy rather than chasing lords across Calradia.
Compatible with Bannerlord v1.2.X+ Requires: Mod Configuration Menu (MCM) v5.10.2 or higher
